mapper.update: update qna set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
update qna set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, Q.* from (select * from qna order by ref desc, step asc) Q)
mapper.insert: insert into qna values(qna_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, 0, sysdate, qna_seq.currval, 0, 0)
